I got this app years ago and played it once. So, the other day, Iâ€™m on hour 4 of a 6 hour plane ride, and Iâ€™ve listened to all the music and audiobooks I can tolerate. Iâ€™m scrolling through my phone looking for something new and I find this preposterous thing! Two hours later, my wife has to nudge me to say the plane has landed and I have to get off. She thought Iâ€™d lost my mind, all the more so when I tried to explain the premise of the game. The thing is, there is no barrier to entry. Any idiot can play instantly. But thereâ€™s a lot to learn - rolled out at just the right pace. And no jamming you up for money. What a breath of fresh air! And the humor in the game is just the greatest - no small part of its appeal. This is just perfect for withdrawing from the world yet retaining the ability to rejoin, reluctantly, if needed. The best!!!

title.label: Update the game for iPhone XS Max

content.label: I love this game but wish it was not small on my phone. Black bars all around.
This is a great game but over time it is really difficult to avoid fish while going down and by the second level it is too hard I canâ€™t even get past 200m!

i was about seven years old when i first played this game. my mom had it on her ipad and i was hooked from the very first time i played it. every time i went in her room, i played this on her ipad while she watched whatever show on the tv. i remember actually "completing" the game when she was asleep and being so shocked and surprised i had to take a few minutes. i was still seven years old so i couldn't comprehend everything, but i know it was significant. 

now i'm sixteen years old and this game has always managed to come into my mind. i downloaded it for myself just yesterday and i've been addicted. it's so simple, yet so interesting that it just pulls you back in for more. the game hasn't changed much since i first played it and i'm glad.

i'm amazed by the simplicity of the game and how nostalgic it's made me. my life is going at a million miles per hour, but it's nice to sit back and play this game. i even showed my mom and we ended up having a conversation about how excited i was playing the game. 

i'm extremely happy this game is still available and i really believe it's worth every penny. of course, i have a connection to it so one may say i'm biased, but i really believe it. it's simple, but really brings you in to play it again and again. 

i can only hope you'll have as much fun playing it as i do.

Are you EVER going to update for iPhone X series or have you abandoned this game? Been a long time since any love has been given to this great game. Used to be my go to for easy fun time killing but haven't played much since other games look so sweet on the extra screen real estate. Thx.

Just wow. This game made me cry at the end. I recommend this to everyone. Even if you hate fishing. To the levels to the fish you can just tell the developers put their heart and soul into this game. I have loved this game since it came out and I still keep replaying it. Amazing work.

                                        Thank you.

title.label: Best Fishing Game on the App Store

content.label:
I have spent over $1,000 in games for iOS, and I can say with confidence that I regret 99% of my purchases. This game, however, from the moment I bought it and up to today, has always been worth it. It combines a unique approach to iOS games that rely on movement of your phone with a story that will make you laugh and cry. The story is emotional and well told, but also completely unessential to the gameplay. If you just want that high score, you donâ€™t have to pay attention to the story, because it doesnâ€™t matter! If you want it though, the story is there for you, with itâ€™s loving message about family and redemption. I wouldnâ€™t recommend this game to anyone who wants to play a realistic fishing game, but I would recommend it to anyone who wants to play a fun game that combines the most essential parts of life: fishing, hunting, and family. 

P.S.
There are many clones of this game, please donâ€™t buy them. Ridiculous Fishing was made by the original developers of Radical Fishing, the first game that combined fishing with throwing fish in the air and shooting them. This is the original game, donâ€™t pay for clones!
Ridiculous fishing brings a fun concept and adds so much more onto it. It is definitely worth the money, add this to your collection and you won't regret it.
Itâ€™s worth the price, itâ€™s amazing and tons of fun itâ€™s good if you want to waste time!!
The only good game on the App Store tbh

Beat the game in less than 12 hours... 

Once you beat it, there is not more missions or anything. Such a waste...
